const exist=prev.find(item=>item.id===productWithSize.id&&item.size===productWithSize.size);if(exist){// Increment quantity
return prev.map(item=>item.id===productWithSize.id&&item.size===productWithSize.size?{...item,quantity:item.quantity+1}:item);}else{// Add new item with size
return[...prev,{...productWithSize,quantity:1}];}});};const removeFromCart=(productId,size)=>{setCart(prevCart=>{// Check if the product exists and reduce its quantity or remove it
